alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Grady; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 12:13AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Grady, Oklahoma, south central Logan and southeastern Canadian Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1213 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Oklahoma City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, El Reno, Guthrie, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Tuttle, Piedmont, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Union City, Minco, Luther and Arcadia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 126 and 155. Interstate 40 between mile markers 121 and 154. Interstate 44 between mile markers 116 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
